text: In the Shadows or In the Shadow may refer to: * In the Shadows (album), 1993 album by Mercyful Fate, and the title track * "In the Shadows" (song), 2003 song by The Rasmus * In the Shadows (2001 film), 2001 film starring Matthew Modine * In the Shadows (2010 film), 2010 German film * In the Shadow (2012 film), Czech film * In the Shadows (2017 film), 2017 Hindi film * In the Shadows (Torchwood), audiobook based on the TV series Torchwood * In the Shadows (video game), 2017 video game * "In the Shadows", a song from Something Wild by Children of Bodom
title: In the Shadows
